English: towering buildings are built up from the ground (idiom)

h.b: ㄨㄢˋ　ㄓㄤˋ　ㄍㄠ　ㄌㄡˊ　ㄆㄧㄥˊ　ㄉㄧˋ　ㄑㄧˇ

e: `如~：「`俗語~`說~：『`萬丈高樓平地起~。』`只要~`肯~`從~`基層~`踏實~`幹~`起~，`終~`有成~`功~`的~`一天~。」

h.p: wàn zhàng gāo lóu píng dì qǐ

English: towering buildings are built up from the ground (idiom)
great oaks from little acorns grow
